results.title: Congenital supravalvular aortic stenosis in a kitten.
results.text_hl: Echocardiography revealed a moderate @<m>DISEASE_Mitral_Valve_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008944 @@@mitral valve regurgitation@@@ and a moderate dynamic @DISEASE_Ventricular_Outflow_Obstruction_Left @DISEASE_MESH:D000092242 @@@left ventricular outflow tract obstruction@@@ both resulting from systolic anterior motion of the @<m>DISEASE_Mitral_Valve_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008944 @@@mitral valve@@@ (@DISEASE_615508 @DISEASE_OMIM:615508 @@@SAM@@@).

citations.NLM: Szatmári V. Congenital supravalvular aortic stenosis in a kitten. J Vet Cardiol. 2022 Jun;41():227-230. PMID: 35567886
citations.BibTeX: @article{35567886, title={Congenital supravalvular aortic stenosis in a kitten.}, author={Szatmári V}, journal={J Vet Cardiol}, volume={41}, pages={227-230}}

results.title: Differential effects of the angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril versus the beta-adrenergic receptor blocker atenolol on hemodynamics and left ventricular contractile function in experimental mitral regurgitation.
results.text_hl: Differential effects of the @GENE_ACE @GENE_610668 @@@angiotensin-converting enzyme@@@ inhibitor @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ versus the beta-adrenergic receptor blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on hemodynamics and left ventricular contractile function in experimental @<m>DISEASE_Mitral_Valve_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008944 @@@mitral regurgitation@@@.

citations.NLM: Nemoto S, Hamawaki M, De Freitas G, Carabello BA. Differential effects of the angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril versus the beta-adrenergic receptor blocker atenolol on hemodynamics and left ventricular contractile function in experimental mitral regurgitation. J Am Coll Cardiol. 2002 Jul 3;40(1):149-54. PMID: 12103269
citations.BibTeX: @article{12103269, title={Differential effects of the angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril versus the beta-adrenergic receptor blocker atenolol on hemodynamics and left ventricular contractile function in experimental mitral regurgitation.}, author={Nemoto S and Hamawaki M and De Freitas G and Carabello BA}, journal={J Am Coll Cardiol}, volume={40}, number={1}, pages={149-54}}

results.title: Congenital cardiac anomalies in an English bulldog.
results.text_hl: Medical management consisted of exercise restriction, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_pimobendan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C041648 @@@pimobendan@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Taurine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013654 @@@taurine@@@.

citations.NLM: McConkey MJ. Congenital cardiac anomalies in an English bulldog. Can Vet J. 2011 Nov;52(11):1248-50. PMID: 22547849
citations.BibTeX: @article{22547849, title={Congenital cardiac anomalies in an English bulldog.}, author={McConkey MJ}, journal={Can Vet J}, volume={52}, number={11}, pages={1248-50}}

results.title: Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: She was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and the class Ia antiarrhythmic drug @CHEMICAL_cifenline @CHEMICAL_MESH:C032151 @@@cibenzoline@@@ to relieve the @DISEASE_Ventricular_Outflow_Obstruction_Right @DISEASE_MESH:D000092243 @@@outflow tract obstruction@@@, and the pressure gradient was reduced to 70 mmHg.

citations.NLM: Kubo T, Kitaoka H, Terauchi Y, Tamura S, Okawa M, Yamasaki N, Yabe T, Doi YL. Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy. J Cardiol. 2010 Jan;55(1):125-9. PMID: 20122559
citations.BibTeX: @article{20122559, title={Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy.}, author={Kubo T and Kitaoka H and Terauchi Y and Tamura S and Okawa M and Yamasaki N and Yabe T and Doi YL}, journal={J Cardiol}, volume={55}, number={1}, pages={125-9}}
